DataElement.preferredName: Substance Extraction Substance Administration Relationship Recipient Donor Relationship Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the self-relationship of the source to the target. EXAMPLE(S): Autologous (self), Allogeneic-related, Allogeneic Unrelated NOTE(S): This is not a familial relationship.
